1818.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And verily|85|91|640$جَعَلْنَا|We have placed|126|138|1137$فِى|in|48|60|89$ٱلسَّمَآءِ|the heavens|102|114|157$بُرُوجًا|constellations|111|123|9727$وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا|and We have beautified it|191|197|9728$لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ|for the observers.|139|139|6665$

1821.verse: وَٱلْأَرْضَ|And the earth,|117|138|2280$مَدَدْنَـٰهَا|We have spread it|141|183|9735$وَأَلْقَيْنَا|and [We] cast|116|158|5113$فِيهَا|therein|66|108|253$رَوَٲسِىَ|firm mountains|116|137|9319$وَأَنۢبَتْنَا|and [We] caused to grow|190|203|9736$فِيهَا|therein|66|91|253$مِن|of|50|75|53$كُلِّ|every|57|82|185$شَىْءٍ|thing|69|94|186$مَّوْزُونٍ|well-balanced.|116|129|9737$

1822.verse: وَجَعَلْنَا|And We have made|148|154|4805$لَكُمْ|for you|67|80|207$فِيهَا|therein|66|79|253$مَعَـٰيِشَ|means of living|118|131|6262$وَمَن|and whom|87|100|1012$لَّسْتُمْ|you are not|97|110|5138$لَهُۥ|for him|65|71|977$بِرَٲزِقِينَ|providers.|101|101|9738$

1824.verse: وَأَرْسَلْنَا|And We have sent|142|148|5142$ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ|the winds|84|96|6467$لَوَٲقِحَ|fertilizing,|84|96|9743$فَأَنزَلْنَا|and We sent down|144|156|561$مِنَ|from|50|62|156$ٱلسَّمَآءِ|the sky|84|96|157$مَآءً|water,|63|69|202$فَأَسْقَيْنَـٰكُمُوهُ|and We gave it to you to drink.|229|247|9744$وَمَآ|And not|72|108|46$أَنتُمْ|you|54|90|796$لَهُۥ|of it|54|90|977$بِخَـٰزِنِينَ|(are) retainers.|121|139|9745$

1825.verse: وَإِنَّا|And indeed, We,|129|150|682$لَنَحْنُ|surely [We]|97|138|9746$نُحْىِۦ|We give life|97|138|9747$وَنُمِيتُ|and We cause death,|162|203|9748$وَنَحْنُ|and We|76|96|319$ٱلْوَٲرِثُونَ|(are) the Inheritors.|153|153|9749$

1826.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And verily|85|100|640$عَلِمْنَا|We know|80|110|9076$ٱلْمُسْتَقْدِمِينَ|the preceding ones|147|177|9750$مِنكُمْ|among you|92|122|643$وَلَقَدْ|and verily,|89|119|640$عَلِمْنَا|We know|80|95|9076$ٱلْمُسْتَــْٔخِرِينَ|the later ones.|137|137|9751$

1831.verse: فَإِذَا|So, when|82|97|1730$سَوَّيْتُهُۥ|I have fashioned him|157|187|9760$وَنَفَخْتُ|and [I] breathed|130|160|9761$فِيهِ|into him|72|102|32$مِن|of|50|80|53$رُّوحِى|My spirit,|86|101|9762$فَقَعُواْ|then fall down|114|214|9763$لَهُۥ|to him|61|260|977$سَـٰجِدِينَ|prostrating."|102|202|6703$

1818.verse: And We have placed within the heaven great stars and have beautified it for the observers.

1819.verse: And We have protected it from every devil expelled [from the mercy of Allah]

1820.verse: Except one who steals a hearing and is pursued by a clear burning flame.

1821.verse: And the earth - We have spread it and cast therein firmly set mountains and caused to grow therein [something] of every well-balanced thing.

1822.verse: And We have made for you therein means of living and [for] those for whom you are not providers.

1823.verse: And there is not a thing but that with Us are its depositories, and We do not send it down except according to a known measure.

1824.verse: And We have sent the fertilizing winds and sent down water from the sky and given you drink from it. And you are not its retainers.

1825.verse: And indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and We are the Inheritor.

1826.verse: And We have already known the preceding [generations] among you, and We have already known the later [ones to come].

1827.verse: And indeed, your Lord will gather them; indeed, He is Wise and Knowing.

1828.verse: And We did certainly create man out of clay from an altered black mud.

1829.verse: And the jinn We created before from scorching fire.

1830.verse: And [mention, O Muhammad], when your Lord said to the angels, "I will create a human being out of clay from an altered black mud.

1831.verse: And when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration."

1832.verse: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely,

1833.verse: Except Iblees, he refused to be with those who prostrated.
